text: Klychte nazvanykh syniv za imenamy yikhnikh batʹkiv. Tse spravedlyvishe pered Allahom. A yakshcho vy ne znayete imen yikhnikh batʹkiv, to vony — vashi braty v relihiyi ta blyzʹki! Ne bude hrikha na vas, yakshcho vy poperednʹo ne maly takoho namiru v sertsi. Allah — Proshchayuchyy, Myloserdnyy
